attributes.action: give michael mcdermott his job back at the dwp

attributes.background: i had my contract terminated by the dwp unfairly i think. i was at the dwp for 4 years unfortunatly during that time i was stabbed in barcelona also i needed operation on my jaw ,my wife was very poorly at the time but the dwp got rid of me because of my time keeping. i know its not the best payed job in the world but i thought it was the best job i had ever had. but because of the civil service cull i lost my job.
